title: SelfCustody
author: SelfCustody
content: I have over 9 years experience in working with blockchains down to the source code level and also creating functional applications that run on blockchain. I have won several build challenges for at the time top 10 coins. My primary experience is with Real World Asset Tokenization using DeFi blockchain, but I am willing to accept anything that can provide an income.I also have experience creating high performance time series data retrieval systems to be used for predictive analysis and charting indicators. I have created real time data visualization systems that can dynamically construct lightweight low bandwidth customized time series chart graphs natively in SVG format.I am the founder/lead developer of the following sites:https://cryptops.exchangehttps://lumag.solutionsLet me know if your project is in need of a developer.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: The Services section is the part of the forum to post your skills.In the bottom left of this page you would see the option to move the topic to a different board.

comments.author: amysteryremains
comments.body: We are working on a new tokenized real world asset exchange, you are welcome to join.. Message me directly..

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: amysteryremains on June 20, 2023, 10:03:15 AMWe are working on a new tokenized real world asset exchange, you are welcome to join.. Message me directly..Hey bravo. I can see that you only have 2 activity and 2 posts. This shows you are only interested in promoting your services and get paid for it. But you are not on the right board. Your post is not gaining good number of views. Only 52 people have read it.Look at the bottom left of this post you will see an option to move topic so that you can move this thread to services board as hugeblack has recommended above.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: SelfCustody on June 06, 2023, 08:10:21 PMI have over 9 years experience in working with blockchains down to the source code level and also creating functional applications that run on blockchain. I have won several build challenges for at the time top 10 coins. My primary experience is with Real World Asset Tokenization using DeFi blockchain, but I am willing to accept anything that can provide an income.I also have experience creating high performance time series data retrieval systems to be used for predictive analysis and charting indicators. I have created real time data visualization systems that can dynamically construct lightweight low bandwidth customized time series chart graphs natively in SVG format.I am the founder/lead developer of the following sites:https://cryptops.exchangehttps://lumag.solutionsLet me know if your project is in need of a developer.Follow what @Upgrade00 said, move your post to the service section, because this is where all the skills that other community members have are posted in the forum. But you know that you must first show elegance to your prospect clients here in the forum.Because you have a long experience but you have no record to show that you have served clients using your skills, or if you don't have one you should first build trust here on this platform, just a piece of advise only.

comments.author: SelfCustody
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on June 06, 2023, 09:18:33 PMThe Services section is the part of the forum to post your skills.In the bottom left of this page you would see the option to move the topic to a different board.Thanks for the advice on moving the topic here to the services section. I am looking forward to conversing and building trust here on the bitcointalk forums.

comments.author: SelfCustody
comments.body: Quote from: amysteryremains on June 20, 2023, 10:03:15 AMWe are working on a new tokenized real world asset exchange, you are welcome to join.. Message me directly..I tried to send you a message but it said your settings blocked my message. Maybe you can try to message me first.

comments.author: SelfCustody
comments.created_time: July 01, 2023, 03:24:04 PMLast edit: July 03, 2023, 04:01:26 AM by SelfCustody
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on July 01, 2023, 05:29:11 AMThis sounds shady to me...Why does a developer looking for projects to work on sound shady? What can I do to prove I am just an honest person looking for legitimate projects to work on?I have just been busy maintaining both the testnet and public Cryptops blockchains while advancing an application that runs on them and have not had much time for social media. I am now pivoting into a new project and looking forward to earning the trust of the bitcoincointalk community.The new project is decentralized community blockchain marketplaces if anyone is interested in using blockchain technology to advance/enhance the capabilities of online social media platforms for the benefit of the members of their communities (not spamming just genuinely looking to build a community that wants to make this project happen).

comments.author: amysteryremains
comments.body: Quote from: SelfCustody on July 01, 2023, 03:20:37 AMQuote from: amysteryremains on June 20, 2023, 10:03:15 AMWe are working on a new tokenized real world asset exchange, you are welcome to join.. Message me directly..I tried to send you a message but it said your settings blocked my message. Maybe you can try to message me first.I tried messaging you but your profile also does not allow newbies to send you PMs. I have changed this setting in my profile, So you should be able to PM me now.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP it is nice you have this number of years experience in the field. I had to check the sites you presented but it baffles me that those sites seems not clear. The sites looks more suspicious OP and very poor design. you made mention of executing many projects, why not present them if they could be able to make a good presentation for you as the other two website you claimed you designed are nothing fit to convince a prospective client in coming your way. If possible, any reputable member here to vouch for the deal you have had with them in the past can give you a pass for deals.

comments.author: Billyscottland

I have won several build challenges for at the time top 10 coins. We can just talk, discuss technology, would be happy to share experiences.Tg Billyscottland
